title.rendered: How We Help: Restaurant Risk and Relevance

content.rendered:
Practice Areas

Restaurant Risk and Relevance

What Would You Like To Make Better?

A brand or career that took decades to build can evaporate in seconds. When the stakes are high, challenging assumptions helps dissipate the cloud of bias that can fog a big decision. We review risk and relevance through the lens of industry forces and consumer behavior, combining operating and financial data to build dynamic and responsive models that deliver actionable insights. 

Our deep and broad experience in global foodservice means that we can advise operators about what’s now and what’s next — and why it matters.

Risk Assessment

Identify and mitigate risks associated with competitive and disruptive threats, geopolitical developments, and exposure to existing and emerging economic, market and financial risks.

Portfolio Strategy

Know where to play and win with what brands and markets; rationalization of brands, units, product mix, acquisition and divestiture decisions.

Modernization Strategy

Harness new tools and trends on the technology front to enable increased productivity, guest service, and analytical capabilities.

Custom Research

Discover what’s now and next and gain a richer understanding of the dynamics influencing the industry, consumer, and competitive landscape.

Brand Revitalization

Reinvigorate and revitalize enthusiasm and relevance of a brand by understanding and honoring its origins and legacy while reimagining how to evolve it in the modern environment.

Brand Messaging

Boost the reach and relevance of brand messaging with fresh perspective and creative for corporate communication, earned media and publicity, and brand reputation management.

We Help Hospitality Businesses Be Brilliant at Both Hospitality and Business

Get in Touch

Select Highlights of Risk and Relevance Insights From Our Research

  • Start with a Brand Audit: How does our brand measure and compare? How can we remain both consistent and relevant?
  • Corporate Communications Plans help mitigate risks and navigate crises and have a quantifiable impact on relieving pressures on the CEO. 
  • Marketing is moving faster than most restaurant chains are modernizing. How do you sort out what’s best for your brand? Start with a marketing audit.
Looking to Revitalize and Reduce Risk?
We Can Help.
